dict.string: Pipeline profile for hardware-accelerated encoding using Linux VAAPI.
intervideosrc channel={VIDEOCHANNEL.0} ! video/x-raw, width=(int)1920, height=(int)1080 ! queue ! videoconvert ! vaapih264enc bitrate=2500 ! rtph264pay name=pay0 pt=96

compositor name=comp background=1 sink_0::xpos=0 sink_0::ypos=0 sink_0::width=1440 sink_0::height=810 sink_0::sizing-policy=1 sink_1::xpos=1440 sink_1::ypos=0 sink_1::width=480 sink_1::height=270 sink_1::sizing-policy=1 ! video/x-raw,width=1920,height=1080 ! queue ! vaapih264enc bitrate=2500 ! rtph264pay name=pay0 pt=96 intervideosrc channel={VIDEOCHANNEL.0} ! videoconvert ! comp.sink_0 intervideosrc channel={VIDEOCHANNEL.1} ! videoconvert ! comp.sink_1
pulsesrc device={PULSEDEV} ! voaacenc bitrate=96000 ! queue ! rtpmp4apay name=pay1 pt=97
audiotestsrc ! voaacenc bitrate=96000 ! queue ! rtpmp4apay name=pay1 pt=97
